QuestData.Title: Find Spy To'gun
QuestData.Description: The Shadow Council has already killed most of our spies, but To'gun was foolish enough to escape only to go back in!$B$BYou must find him. He may be reckless, but we need to find out what he knows.
QuestData.LogDescription: Locate Spy To'gun in the Shadow Labyrinth of Auchindoun.
QuestData.RewardText: Do you think you could help me get out of this cage? It's a bit cramped.
